Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.thedigginggame.tile.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that holds information for a Tile that is used in the terrain.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tile

        public Tile(int x,
    int y,
    int cols,
    int rows)
        Construct a Tile with the specified location and size.
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal offset in the SpriteSheet.
        y - The vertical offset in the SpriteSheet.
        cols - The amount of columns the Tile takes up on the SpriteSheet.
        rows - The amount of rows the Tile takes up on the SpriteSheet.
